version_description:
Revamped Graph UI
Performance improvements - Improved battery life and smoother UI

Please uninstall the previous version of app before installing version 0.2

1. Notes option is added to allow Blood Glucose, Food, Insulin, Exercise logging
2. Now you can make changes to settings and will be able to select,
a. Unit of measurement of your choice mg/dL or mmol/L
b. Set Target Range
c. Voice Notifications - ON/OFF
d. Voice Notifications Repeat - ON/OFF, 30 seconds/ 60 seconds/ 150 seconds
3. Voice Notifications will announce glucose reading even when phone is in silent mode
4. Widget is added to see glucose reading, trend arrow, voice notification status when phone is locked

LinkBluCon iOS app
Following features are added in this release
- Support for Apple watch, now you can see reading/trends on Apple watch. You will still need iPhone though
- Profile, to view and edit user information
- Registration and login
- User can add up to 5 Caregivers
- User can share the readings with the healthKit
- Fixed many issues related with connectivity, voice notifications

- Now add Calibration directly from the homepage.
- Notes updates to Caregiver.
- Able to remove followers from a list of Caregiver.
- Better connectivity.*
- Many bugs are fixed.

- Support for Pro Sensors
- Bug fixes and improvements
- Improved connectivity

- Added Libre2 support.
- Fixes couple of bugs with Watch App.

Note: To see correct active days for Libre2 sensors, you have to tap on the sensor status on home page and pick date and time when you activated sensor.

Fetching LibrePro history.
Libre Pro bug fixed.
watch related issues fixed.
